+ Assistant Secretary Mathbrush's Author Page

++ Useful Links for Me to Remember

++ SCP's

Now with more mise-en-abime.

++
Thanks to those who have used or remixed these works in their own content! Shout out to Dr Bob for the animation for SCP-4032, Dr. Cimmerian and others for reading SCP-4500, and the translators of some of my SCP's. Thanks to SunnyClockwork for the SCP-4500 art!

++ Interactive Fiction

Before I started writing on SCP-Wiki, I wrote a several interactive fiction games (text adventures), which are listed at [http://ifdb.tads.org/showuser?id=nufzrftl37o9rw5t the Interactive Fiction Database].
